In England, in the seven days to 11 April, there were 15,994 new confirmed cases (28.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 04 April, there were 18,083 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 12% (2,089 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 16 April is 3,830,891 (6,806 cases per 100,000 population).
